text: (nabiye!) niyata vasayenma api obata perada bohomayak dutayinva ovunge janatava veta yævvemu. ovunda ovun veta pæhædili vu dæya (vana sadhakayan) gena avaha. (ehet eva ovun pratiksepa kara dæmuha). ebævin (eva pratiksepa kala) væradikaruvan veta api pali gattemu. (mandayat mese pali gena) visvasavantayinta udav kirima apa kerehi anivaryaya yutukamak vasayen tibuni
